channel.title: I Need Help Running a Server, Something's Messed up &(
channel.description:
Hello ;) i'm new to coding server's and all but i know about coding RSPS, and this goes to all the 200 REP's out there I have JDK6U24 for some reason it won't let me run, here's what happens when i try to "runserver"
@echo off title Bone-Scape v3 cd ../build "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\java.exe" net/com/codeusa/Server 43594 pause
^ that's my edited Version.
@echo off title Bone-Scape v3 cd ../build "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" net/com/codeusa/Server 43594 pause
that's the original one. both don'twork.
this is what happens. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/com/codeusa/Serve r Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.com.codeusa.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: net/com/codeusa/Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
and on the original runserver file ... The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
Thanks for helping! if i get any! :D Gratitudes,Gemm

item.title: I Need Help Running a Server, Something's Messed up &(
item.dc:creator: @Gemm Gemm
item.description:
@Gemm wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:3, topic:388783”][quote author=beast k0 link=topic=484604.msg3551056#msg3551056 date=1301527678]
What source?
[/quote]

codeusa?..

The first error the run program can’t locate the server.class file.

The second error, you haven’t set your environment variables correctly (if I can remember right).[/quote]

Thank’ i did not know that

Actually i haven’t fixed none, i just didn’t realize what the problem was 7:38 P.M UPDATED -->

I would learn faster from Teamviewer.
Just too difficult for me.

For you it’s like brushing your teeth

Currently Running 64-Bit, but for my Runserver , i dd (x86) and sometime’s it works.

And yes moderator, my Environment Variables are correct, CLASSPATH, PATH, BOTH JDK6U24

Read full topic

item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Fixed your second problem?

By the way, what version of Java are you currently running, and is your computer 32-bit or 64-bit?

item.dc:creator: @Gemm Gemm
item.description:
@Gemm wrote:

To be honest i just dled the source, and yes it’s codeusa source. mind using TEAMVIEWER?

This problem’s (“FOR ME”) are waaayy up high my rate, if someone can help me threw TV , i would really appreciate it.

Thank’s Mod, i didn’t know that.

item.title: I Need Help Running a Server, Something's Messed up &(
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

beast k0:

What source?

codeusa?..

The first error the run program can’t locate the server.class file.

The second error, you haven’t set your environment variables correctly (if I can remember right).

item.title: I Need Help Running a Server, Something's Messed up &(
item.dc:creator: @Gemm Gemm
item.description:
@Gemm wrote:

Hello i’m new to coding server’s and all but i know about coding RSPS, and this goes to all the 200 REP’s out there I have JDK6U24
for some reason it won’t let me run, here’s what happens when i try to “runserver”

@echo off
title Bone-Scape v3
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\java.exe” net/com/codeusa/Server 43594
pause

^ that’s my edited Version.

@echo off
title Bone-Scape v3
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” net/com/codeusa/Server 43594
pause

that’s the original one. both don’twork.

this is what happens.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/com/codeusa/Serve
r
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.com.codeusa.Server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)
Could not find the main class: net/com/codeusa/Server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

and on the original runserver file …
The system cannot find the path specified.
Press any key to continue . . .

Thanks for helping! if i get any!
Gratitudes,Gemm
